body: Oh god, this reminds me of the time I kissed a girl in the lips back in 2nd grade. I don’t know why I did that, but it was because some guy who loved teasing me a lot “coerced” me and the girl to do it. I also remember getting scolded by the teacher 😂 (idk if my parents scolded me too but they probably did, my memory isn’t as bright as it used to)
